AI Description: R-Bioconductor Generics is a package within the Bioconductor project that defines generic functions for manipulating genomic data. It provides a uniform interface for various Bioconductor packages to interact with genomic data structures efficiently.
Core Features: Defines Generic Functions For Genomic Data Manipulation, Uniform Interface For Bioconductor Packages, Efficient Interaction With Genomic Data Structures
General Tags: R Package, Bioinformatics, Genomics, Data Manipulation
